BTS.title: RM (Kim Nam-joon)
BTS.description: RM (short for Real Me, formerly Rap Monster) is a South Korean rapper-songwriter, composer and producer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the leader and main rapper of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: Jin (Kim Seok-jin)
BTS.description: Jin (진) is a South Korean singer, songwriter and actor under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the vocalist and visual of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: Suga (Min Yoon-gi)
BTS.description: Suga (슈가; also known as Agust D) is a South Korean rapper, composer, and producer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the lead rapper of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: J-Hope (Jung Ho-seok)
BTS.description: J-Hope (제이홉), often stylised j-hope, is a South Korean rapper, producer, composer and dancer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the main dancer, rapper, and vocalist of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: Jimin (Park Ji-min)
BTS.description: Jimin (지민) is a South Korean singer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the main dancer and lead vocalist of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: V (Kim Tae-Hyung)
BTS.description: V (뷔) is a South Korean singer-songwriter and actor under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the lead dancer, vocalist, visual, and face of the group of the boy group BTS.

BTS.title: Jungkook (Jeon Jeong-guk)
BTS.description: Jungkook (정국) is a South Korean singer, rapper and dancer under Big Hit Entertainment. He is the main vocalist, lead dancer, rapper, center and maknae of the boy group BTS.
